summary: This document is a summary of account transactions for Jeffrey Epstein at Deutsche Bank for the month of March 2018. It details the account balance, deposits, withdrawals, and various debits including payments to other companies and service charges.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Steuart Oldfield
persons.context: Steuart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: George Brittain
persons.context: George Brittain is mentioned as a recipient of outgoing money transfers from Epstein's account.

connections.description: Steuart Oldfield is a representative of Deutsche Bank providing assistance to Jeffrey Epstein regarding his account.
George Brittain is associated with Epstein through financial transactions, receiving payments from Epstein's account.

events.title: Account Summary for March 2018
events.description: The document summarizes the financial transactions of Jeffrey Epstein's account for the month of March 2018.

locations: 6100 Red Quarter, B3 St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account balance at the beginning of March 2018 was $156,774.31.
Significant outgoing transfers included payments to George Brittain Land Design Inc.
The document includes various preauthorized debits for payroll and utility payments.
There were no overdraft fees reported for the statement period.
Steuart Oldfield is the contact person for inquiries related to the account.
